content: p1 k2 x6 48 round 45 k2 p1 k1 p1 k3 x6 48 round 46 k1 p1 k1 p1 k4 x6 48 same as row 45 shifted by one st round 47 k2 p1 k1 p1 k3 x6 48 same as row 45 round 48 k1 p1 k1 p1 k4 x6 48 same as row 46 work the 2x2 rib rounds 49-56 k2 p2 around 48 bind off return to the thumb pick up sts from waste yarn picking up an extra st on each side of the thumb sts rounds a-b k around 20 rounds c-h k1 p2 k2 p2 x4 k1 20 creates a 2x2 ribbing bind off and weave in ends repeat to make the second glove 2
